UiControllerReview¶

class mnemosyne.libmnemosyne.ui_controller_review.UiControllerReview(component_manager)¶

Controls the behaviour of a widget which implements the ReviewWidget interface.

activate()¶
Initialisation code called when the component is about to do actual work, and which can’t happen in the constructor, e.g. because components on which it relies have not yet been registered.
card_type_by_id(id)¶
card_types()¶
config()¶
database()¶
deactivate()¶
filters()¶
get_counters()¶
Returns tuple (scheduled_count, non_memorised_count, active_count).
grade_answer(grade)¶
heartbeat()¶
For code that needs to run periodically, e.g. to react to a change of date.
is_answer_showing()¶
is_question_showing()¶
log()¶
main_widget()¶
new_question(learn_ahead=False)¶
plugins()¶
rebuild_queue()¶
Called when something in the GUI could have invalidated the queue. (e.g. card deletion).
reload_counters()¶
To be called when counters need to be reloaded from the database.
reset()¶
review_widget()¶
scheduler()¶
show_answer()¶
stopwatch()¶
ui_controller_main()¶
ui_controller_review()¶
update_dialog()¶
